title: The President’s Number One Fresh Wife - Novel Updates
tags: Female Master   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Queen   女王
description: Gu Yanxi irritated a man In her salad days. And then she turned to be that man’s wife when she grew up. She was forced to become that man’s unpresentable wife. Furthermore, she had to commit the obligation as a wife. In the dark endless days, all ruthless demands of that man didn’t defeat Gu Yanxi, instead she lived much stronger. Who said that bad cards in hand is destined to lose? Gu Yanxi persists in training the arrogant and bad guy into a loyal husband!>
